channel.title: Spawn on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Spawn on purpleidea.com

item.title: Introducing Puppet Exec['again']
item.description: Puppet is missing a number of much-needed features. That’s the bad news. The good news is that I’ve been able to write some of these as modules that don’t need to change the Puppet core! This is an article about one of these features. Posit: It’s not possible to apply all of your Puppet manifests in a single run. I believe that this holds true for the current implementation of Puppet.
